title: Tender Notice: ADMINISTRATING UNIT OF TAX AND CUSTOMS COURTS Seeks "Acquisition Of Legal Texts For Tax And Customs Courts" (542429-9-L119)
body:
Chile, Oct. 11 -- ADMINISTRATING UNIT OF TAX AND CUSTOMS COURTS has posted a tender notice for 
"Acquisition Of Legal Texts For Tax And Customs Courts."

Tender Details: Acquisition Of Legal Texts For Tax And Customs Courts

Tender ID :542429-9-L119

ACQUISITION OF LEGAL TEXTS FOR TAX AND CUSTOMS COURTS

Responsible for this tender: ADMINISTRATOR UNIT OF TAX AND CUSTOMS COURTS, ADMINISTRATOR UNIT 
OF TAX AND CUSTOMS COURTS

Closing Date: 10-21-201915:30:00

Claims received for breaching payment term: 0 This number indicates the claims received by this institution from 
the last 12 months until yesterday. Remember to interpret this information withconsidering the amount of tenders 
and purchase orders that this institution generates in the Public Market.

Financier: Self Financed

Competition Type: ICB

The tender notice no. is 542429-9-L119.

The expression of interest should be received by Oct. 21.

Purchaser's contact details: Chile

[Disclaimer : For Exact Organization/Tendering Authority details, please refer the tender notice.].
